original: Johansson, Carl Robert, direktör, Göteborg, f. 30i/10/82 i Gbg. G. 10 m. Karin Köhlberg. Barn: Bertil f. 11, Tycho 20, Birgit 25. — Majornas ele-m:lärov. 98, ensk. hand:- o. språk-und:visn. Anst. h. firma Victor Janson i Gbg 98-15, h. Färg A-B International i Gbg :s. kont :chef o. kamr. 14-34, verkst. dir. där samt i Marie-bolms Nya Industri A-B sed. 34. Suppl. i styr. f. de två sistnämnda föret., led. av ’Styr. f. Såpförädlings A-B i Gbg, Färg- & Fernissfabr. fören. i Sthlm o. Färg- & Fernissfabr. råva-rufören. där, ordf. i Isoleringsfirmornas fören. i Gbg. PatrstGM.
translated: Johansson, Carl Robert, director, Gothenburg, b. 30/10/82 in Gothenburg. Married in 1910 to Karin Köhlberg. Children: Bertil b. 1911, Tycho b. 1920, Birgit b. 1925. Educated at Majornas elementary school in 1898, self-employed in language instruction. Employed by the Victor Janson company in Gothenburg from 1898 to 1915, employed as manager and accountant at Färg A-B International's Gothenburg office from 1914 to 1934, and as director of operations there and at Mariebolms Nya Industri A-B since 1934. Serves as a board member for the latter two companies, as well as for Såpförädlings A-B in Gothenburg, Färg- & Fernissfabr. fören. in Sthlm, and Färg- & Fernissfabr. råvarufören. there. Also serves as chairman of the Isolation Firms association in Gothenburg. Awarded the Patriotic Medal.
